column1: in memory of thomas ruane deane| born: september 6
column3: 2015 this memorial provided by:owens & brumley funeral homeswichita falls
column14: 2015. funeral services will be held at 10:00 a. m. thursday
column17: in the chapel of owens and brumley funeral home with rev. billy jackson
column18: officiating. interment will follow at bowman cemetery under the direction of owens and brumley funeral home of wichita falls. thomas was born on september 6
column21: ohio. he was employed as a pharmaceutical technician. he loved being with family and friends
column22: listening to music as well as playing guitar. thomas also enjoyed card games
column24: and was an avid star wars fan. thomas was preceded in death by his father
column25: thomas ruane deane. he is survived by his wife
column26: sarah deane of gainesville; his children
column27: shelby dillard and kyriana crum of wichita falls
column28: and shayna deane of gainesville; his mother
column32: and greg rose of nebraska; two sisters
column34: and dorothy mc. elory and husband wes of massachusetts; as well as numerous cousins
column35: nieces and nephews. the family will receive friends from 6 until 8 p. m. wednesday
column38: at owens and brumley funeral home of wichita falls.
